entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Baker Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:55 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -30.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Baker Lake Airport 4:00 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -30.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -44
Dewpoint: -34.8°C
Wind: WNW 19 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 50 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 35 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny near noon. Blowing snow. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 60 gusting to 80 in the morning then diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 35 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 55 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Blowing snow. Low minus 38.
entry.summary: Clear. Blowing snow. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 38. Wind chill near minus 56. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023
